subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant’s speech Tuesday, when he was named the N.B.A.’s most valuable player, seemed to spur the Thunder. And he contributed 32 points, 12 rebounds and 9 assists.
snippet: Kevin Durant’s speech Tuesday, when he was named the N.B.A.’s most valuable player, seemed to spur the Thunder. And he contributed 32 points, 12 rebounds and 9 assists.
